OUR COUNTRY
YOUR DESTINATION

Destination Italia aims at providing independent travellers, tour operators and travel agencies with unrivalled opportunity to discover the best of Italy and their best option to search, book and experience the landmark that have made Italy the most desired destination in the world as well as the secret places that will make the journey truly unforgettable. We’ll offer thorough knowledge and completeness of all the territories, depth of offer and state of the art technology. Stay tuned!

Scroll

■

ABOUT US

Destination Italia will be active with platforms dedicated to the B2C and B2B markets, with a clear mission to promote and add value to Italy as a “touristic product”, by focusing on the destination and with two main goals as element of competitiveness: exclusivity and integration of the product offering and service innovation. Destination Italia has been founded by lastminute.com, one of the largest online travel agents globally, together with Intesa Sanpaolo, the largest Italian bank (and one of the pargest and best performing banks in Europe, with the goal of providing the travel industry with a superior option to travel Italy, since ever the iconic destination of travellers around the world.
